title: A boke of the propreties of herbes called an herball wherunto is added the time [the] herbes, floures and sedes shold be gathered to be kept the whole yere, wyth the vertue of [the] herbes when they are stilled. Also a generall rule of all maner of herbes drawen out of an auncyent booke of phisyck by W.C.
author: Copland, William, d. 1568 or 9.
publicationStmtPublisher: In the Fletestrete at the sygne of the Rose Garland by me Wyllyam Copland for Iohn wyght,
